Name: Help
Text: Add 1 to the total of any roll. This can be done during any Phase, once per Phase.

Name: Hinder
Text: Reduce the total of any roll by 1. This can be done during any Phase, once per Phase.

Name: Mischief
Text: Roll (PIB)d6. When two other characters do a Competing Roll, you can swap one of the rolls for either of your rolls.

Name: Swindle
Text: The GM spends 1d6 to deal (Lv) damage to an enemy. This can be done during any Phase.

Name: Weighted Die
Text: Force an enemy to reroll a rolled die. This can be done during any Phase.

Name: Revival
Text: Choose an ally with 0 Health. Next Player Phase, their Health is restored to Lv+PIB.
